SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT202COV
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by or on behalf of the ordering institution directly, or through correspondent(s), to the financial institution of the beneficiary institution.
It must only be used to order the movement of funds related to an underlying customer credit transfer that was sent with the cover method.
The MT 202 COV must not be used for any other interbank transfer. For these transfers the MT 202 must be used.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
Time indication must be a valid time expressed as HHMM (Error code(s): T38).
Sign is either '+' or '-' (Error code(s): T15).

Time offset is expressed as 'HHMM', where the hour component, that is, 'HH', must be in the range of 00 through 13, and the minute component, that is, 'MM', must be in the range of 00 through 59. Any 'HH' or 'MM' component outside of these range checks will be disallowed (Error code(s): T16).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency.(Error code(s): C03)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).

Identifier Code must not be a BEI. See the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information about BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations (Error code(s): C05).
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

fieldvalidation.name: U08
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid syntax, format, code word in tag 119(Validation Flag), or field tag 119 is missing. Allowed value is COV."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 If field 56a is present in sequence A, then field 57a must also be present in sequence A (Error code(s): C81).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 56a is present in sequence A, then field 57a must also be present in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 If field 56a is present in sequence B, then field 57a must also be present in sequence B (Error code(s): C68).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 56a is present in sequence B, then field 57a must also be present in sequence B"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-72: The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining Lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]].
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining Lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50a-A With option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier), one of the following line formats must be used (Error code(s): T54): Line format 1 :/34x (Account) Line format 2 :4!a/2!a/27x (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. One of the following line formats must be used: /34x (Account) or 4!a/2!a/27x (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier)"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50a-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50a-B In option F, when subfield 1 Party Identifier is used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format, one of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T55): ARNU, CCPT, CUST, DRLC, EMPL, NIDN, SOSE and TXID."
fieldvalidation.formula: Implies(B.F50a.FormatOption == 'F', Verify50FPartyIdCode($value)) /* get the code from party identifier if format is 4!a/2!a/27x */
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. When 'Party Identifier' is used with the format (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier), one of following codes must be used: ARNU, CCPT, CUST, DRLC, EMPL, NIDN, SOSE and TXID."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50a-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50a-C With option F, subfield 2 (Name & Address), the following line format must be used for all lines: 1!n/33x (Number)(Details). (Error code(s): T54).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name & Address' value. With option F, subfield 2 (Name & Address), the following line format must be used for all lines :1!n/33x (Number)(Details)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50a-D
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50a-D In option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier) used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Party Identifier' value. In option F, subfield 1 (Party Identifier) used with the (Code)(Country Code)(Identifier) format: Country Code must be a valid ISO country code."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50a-E
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50a-E With option F - subfield 2 (Name & Address), should start with Number 1 to 8 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec (Error code(s): T56).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name & Address' value. With option F - subfield 2 (Name & Address), should start with Number 1 to 8 and it should follow the line formatting rules as specified in the SWIFT spec."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50a-F
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50a-F Number 4 must be followed by a valid date in the format YYYYMMDD and this date, local to the sender, must not be later than the date on which the message is successfully sent to SWIFT (Error code(s): T50).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name & Address' value. Number 4 must be followed by a valid date in the format YYYYMMDD and this date, local to the sender, must not be later than the date on which the message is successfully sent to SWIFT."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-50a-G
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-50a-G Numbers 3, 5, 6 and 7 must be followed by a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid 'Name & Address' value. Numbers 3, 5, 6 and 7 must be followed by a valid ISO country code."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-72
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-72 The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]].
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-52a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-52a-A The value specified for Party Identifier should indicate a national clearing system code.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-56a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-56a-A The value specified for Party Identifier should indicate a national clearing system code.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-57a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-57a-A The value specified for Party Identifier should indicate a national clearing system code.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.comment: FA-58a-A The value specified for Party Identifier should indicate a national clearing system code.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-56a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-56a-A The value specified for Party Identifier should indicate a national clearing system code.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-57a-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-57a-A The value specified for Party Identifier should indicate a national clearing system code.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Party Identifier is not valid. The value following the national clearing system code does not conform to the format specified for that code."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI-1
fieldvalidation.comment: "For specific message types, an European currency must not be used as the currency of settlement after a cut-off date (Error Code: E76)."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "For specific message types, an European currency must not be used as the currency of settlement after a cut-off date (Error Code: E76)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 72 Reject/Return: code word error, or mandatory code word missing, or code word not in the proper sequence, or format 6*35x not satisfied"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-72-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 72 Reject/Return: code word error, or mandatory code word missing, or code word not in the proper sequence, or format 6*35x not satisfied"

fieldvalidation.name: ERI-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."
